info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 06 at 1:14PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern McDowell, northeastern Rutherford, northwestern Cleveland and southern Burke Counties through 145 PM EDT... At 113 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 6 miles north of Forest City, or 4 miles north of Bostic, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Morganton, Forest City, Glen Alpine, Bostic, Casar, South Mountains State Park, Ellenboro, Spindale, Lake James State Park and Lake James. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
